long_description: Designed to work with the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handelbar Mount (sold separately), the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Light Holder is a simple click-in attachment that organizes your headlight, battery and wires. Mounts or dismounts in seconds so you can easily take along a bike light. Works with virtually any type of bike headlight and battery setup.
short_description: Designed to work with the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handelbar Mount (sold separately), the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Light Holder is a simple click-in attachment that organizes your headlight, battery and wires.
